member this.ClassName : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要从查询中选择的类名。

span.span: Gets or sets the class name to be selected from in the query.

value.span: 返回一个 值，该值包含查询中的类的名称。

span.span: Returns a value containing the name of the class in the query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性值将覆盖对象中存储的任何先前值。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 重新生成查询字符串以反映新的类名。The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new class name. **Classname**属性的值会将 "select \* \ WHERE \" 格式的选择查询中的 classname > 项替换为。A value for the **ClassName** property would replace the \ item in a SELECT query of the form "SELECT \* FROM \ WHERE \". ## 属性值Property Value 一个字符串, 表示查询中类的名称。A string representing the name of the class in the query. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[从部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例通过指定查询并更改属性来初始化。The following example initializes a by specifying a query and then changes the property. summary.span: 获取或设置要在 SELECT 查询中应用的条件。

span.span: Gets or sets the condition to be applied in the SELECT query.

value.span: 返回一个 值，该值包含要应用于 SELECT 查询的条件。

span.span: Returns a value containing the condition to be applied to the SELECT query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性值将覆盖对象中存储的任何先前值。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 重新生成查询字符串以反映新的条件。The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new condition. **Condition**属性的值将替换 "select \* \ WHERE \" 形式的 "select \* FROM \ 项的条件。A value for the **Condition** property would replace the \ item in a SELECT query of the form "SELECT \* FROM \ WHERE \". ## 属性值Property Value 一个字符串, 其中包含要在 SELECT 查询中应用的条件。A string containing the condition to be applied in the SELECT query. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[从部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此查询是架构查询还是实例查询。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this query is a schema query or an instances query.

value.span: 返回一个 值，该值指示查询是否为架构查询。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the query is a schema query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性值将覆盖对象中存储的任何先前值。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 重新生成查询字符串以反映新的查询类型。The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new query type. ## 属性值Property Value `true`如果应对该架构计算此查询, 则为; 否则为。`false`如果对实例求值, 则为。`true` if this query should be evaluated over the schema; `false` if the query should be evaluated over instances. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[从部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

summary.span: 以字符串形式获取或设置 对象中的查询。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性值将覆盖对象中存储的任何先前值。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 此外, 设置此属性将导致在被重新分析字符串时更新对象的其他成员。In addition, setting this property causes the other members of the object to be updated when the string is reparsed. ## 属性值Property Value 一个表示查询的字符串。A string representing the query. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[从部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例使用无参数构造函数初始化, 然后更改该属性。The following example initializes a with the parameterless constructor and then changes the property.
